Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: patty
Reviews.Content: The phone looked just like it was described.  The only problem was I was expecting a charger and missed where it stated there was no charger to go with it.  Other than that it has been a great phone.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Bennett
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Pantech cell as a replacement for my lost phone. After a lot of research, I felt like this device would satisfy both my texting and calling needs. It also has the expanded space (memory card slot) for my music. I am very happy to report that this phone is exactly what I wanted with a lot of extra features available. My favorite feature is the Qwerty Keyboard.

Reviews.Title: great simple phone
Reviews.Author: Pamela K. Barr
Reviews.Content: this is a great, simple phone to use and has a full keyboard.  This is the second one Ive owned, first pink now blue.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, but...
Reviews.Author: Chico
Reviews.Content: ...the battery cover should have been installed north/south instead of east/west. When opening the phone to text with the qwerty keyboard I keep pulling the battery cover off. Had to purchase a phone case for the back to keep this to from happening.

Reviews.Title: Battery cover
Reviews.Author: sdb
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine for me, but the battery cover does not stay on. It pops off constantly and does not click into place.  Very annoying.

Reviews.Title: Great only for texting
Reviews.Author: Mike McCloskey "Bob"
Reviews.Content: The texting ability on this phone is fantastic. The keys are easy to use and the screen is a decent size. If you are a frequent texter, this phone may be ideal.But if texting isn't really your thing, you may not be super fond of this phone because most of the other things about it are sub-par. For example, the screen on the front to see who is calling, or to scan through the address book is very difficult to read. The buttons on the front have zero texture, and the phone goes to sleep frequently so you have to keep pressing the flat front where the buttons light up hoping that it will sense it and not go to sleep while you are trying to press them. If it does go to sleep, the front stops lighting up and you will need to press the 'hold' button on the side. Hanging up a call is also difficult because the phone wants to lock/go to sleep before you can hit the 'end call button'. Many times I have had to open the phone just to hang up, when it had been closed for the entire call. Better hurry if you are trying to hang up before an answering machine kicks on!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: myranda
Reviews.Content: my husband absolutely loves it. the battery life is amazing and he couldn't be more satisfied. wouldnt trade it for anything else

Reviews.Title: An "OK" Phone But Not Exceptional
Reviews.Author: Nostalgicdad
Reviews.Content: This phone is an ok phone for what I need it to do. I am old school. I need a phone for talking and texting and that's pretty much it. It does both and I have no major problems with that. But I do have a problem with a couple of things.The battery does not hold a charge long enough, and it is supposed to be a brand new phone and battery.I never turn my phone off and it will only hold a charge for maybe a week,tops.The phone's shape and design, does not allow a case to stay on properly.The top part of the case has one corner that will not go down and snap on at all. The case does stay on, but the one corner that won't snap on,causes the phone case to pop off sometimes. Poor design. The keypad is flat and it is nearly impossible to type a message without hitting other letters that you don't want to hit. I have to hit my back/delete button all the time to correct the spelling because of the flat "Qwerty" keypad.Plus, there are too many steps that you have to go through to pull up a name in the contacts just to call them or send them a text. That procedure could have been shortened. I do not take pictures with any phone, so I cannot comment on the quality of any pics. I may use it for pics but for now I don't. I use a digital camera for that.One good thing for me is, I do surveys and build up points that redeem for gift card codes here on Amazon, and I didn't have to pay not one red cent for this phone. Gift card codes paid for it from the surveys I do. All in all, is this a good phone? Yes, it is and is it worth what I paid for it? Yes, I think so. Would I buy this same phone again if I needed another phone? Probably so, but only through gift card codes so that I would not pay any cash for it. It's a good phone, but battery life isn't as good as it should be and the design is flawed in the keypad and the shape which isn't good for a protector case. If you need just a basic phone that allows calls and texting, and other features that you may or may not use, this one will do that. Oh and one last thing; this phone does not have a USB port to allow it to be connected to computer to download better ringtones.On my previous phone I was able to download ringtones through a USB port into the limited memory. I had some Disney World ringtones which was cool. This phone has to take a micro memory card, which is a flaw in itself, because that requires a purchase of a micro card. Phone does not come with micro card.The ringtones are quite cheesy and I am stuck with them until I get a memory card.The battery charger will only plug into an electrical outlet. My previous phone had the option of using electrical outlet or removing adapter and plugging it into computer. This phone has no charging options. Another flaw in its design.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone
Reviews.Author: Chet Baker
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little phone! It is really nice for texting. The OLED front looks really cool! It functions well too. Only giving it 4 stars because sometimes you have to open up the phone to end a call. Battery life is about 2 days of mild use. It's not a smartphone, but one of the best messaging phones I've ever owned.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Be-Real
Reviews.Content: my friend like this phone alot but just need more time with it so can understand more about it ! no problem so far !

Reviews.Title: pantech Impact P7000
Reviews.Author: james ellett
Reviews.Content: I have tmobile and this phone works fine for talking and texting. I cannot get internet or download ringtones. I think that may only work for att. I do like the looks and feel of it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: River1
Reviews.Content: At the price a must buy I love everything about it! The camera is awesome. The large keys make texting really fast too :)

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Jo
Reviews.Content: I needed to get my father a new phone that was still basic but had Bluetooth for his car. This phone is just that and the keyboard inside is easy for him to figure out and reinforces his learning of the qwerty keyboard for working on the computer. He's been loving it* no matter how many times he's dropped it so far, it is still working hahaha

Reviews.Title: Pantech phone
Reviews.Author: D. Riedinger
Reviews.Content: Perfect.  My daughter had one, it broke it, loved it and was happy to get another one like it.  It's great.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: brad bridges
Reviews.Content: not a bad phone battery life kinda crappy perfect for a cheap text messaging phoneit comes in blue or pink

Reviews.Title: greatbuttt
Reviews.Author: amaya
Reviews.Content: It was great but when i put the back on itsomething happend and it dident fit so ya otherwise it was great

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: Can I say more, Yes mne came with battery, charger and was new in box with directions, Got yesterday, charged it up and it still has 3 bars, If I need another in the future I willorder this again,  Highly reommend to others, Have ATT thus just put my card in and worked great,

Reviews.Title: Does the job- most of the time
Reviews.Author: busybee
Reviews.Content: Pros: It calls. it texts. it allows some internet browsing. it takes pictures and videos. It stores contacts.Cons: It randomly turns off. If you have it set to auto delete the messages it stops working. The charger is easy to break and annoying.I wont be buying it again.

Reviews.Title: wouldn't recommend this phone
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Bought the phone as a gift for my daughter and it would power up, so just returned but wasn't impressed on how the phone felt. Just a cheap feel is all.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Rhonda
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. I had one before, but it was a used one that someone had gotten wet. I was so glad to get one to replace it at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Broke quick
Reviews.Author: Dot
Reviews.Content: Broke after a month or use. Had not been dropped. Not worth it. Spend a little more for a better phone

Reviews.Title: don't but one
Reviews.Author: shelley orf
Reviews.Content: It is too sensitive and complicated to work. It puts on hold or hangs up accidentally, and it really makes me angry.

Reviews.Title: Not bad.
Reviews.Author: R. Swanson
Reviews.Content: It's a bit bigger than expected.  I can't figure the thing out (too used to a smartphone) but it's my daughter's and she's figured it out okay.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I rated this because its a great phone. I truly love the keyboard its the exact phone that i wanted.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: don't buy this. I could not hear. cheap, cheap, I went back to phone store & got a new different one all together. I put this on a shelf & when I remembered I might cough return, it was too late. Now I am stuck with a cheap phone that is useless. Used about two weeks. 30 day return. You get what you pay for. If any one wants this cheap thing let me know.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Paul Marshall
Reviews.Content: But it is not user friendly, even for other Panetech users. It will take a few years to get used to.  you may want to try something else.

Reviews.Title: Pantech cell phone
Reviews.Author: Theresa Hamrick
Reviews.Content: It's just OK. It does seem as efficient as my last phone and doesn't have as many options. My husband and I got the same phone simultaneously. On his, for reasons unknown (he didn't drop or abuse it in any way) the clip on back that covers the battery won't fit back on. This happened almost immediately after receiving it. I believe they were new phones.

Reviews.Title: Pantech phone
Reviews.Author: Beverly Athans
Reviews.Content: Phone was in excellent condition but we can't get the back to stay on. Very disappointed in that happening, but otherwise good buy.

Reviews.Title: I'm Learning
Reviews.Author: Shersea "Sherry Feltch"
Reviews.Content: The keys are kinda small to use but I have long nails and have never used a keyboard before. I  love the size and the use of it. The manual is in very small print so I'll soon get it down. I haven't had a new phone in 21/2 yrs so this is a big adjustment for me and I'm 53 so I wud say great product once I get it down :)

Reviews.Title: Died after 15 days
Reviews.Author: Julio Palma Lopez
Reviews.Content: Item was returned, it died after 15 days of use, not the battery but the functions of the phone.You could see people calling, but microphone or speaker didnt work, so no conversation happening with this phoneFor anything else than talking, good phone.

Reviews.Title: NOT FOR ME
Reviews.Author: HAROLD G.
Reviews.Content: It is too difficult to understand and to program.  Wish that better instructions were available for programing,. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good phone busy teen
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: This is a good phone for teens who throw their phones into duffle bags, etc.  This was a brand new phone and works perfect.  Very fast shipping with tracking.

Reviews.Title: Good phone with a lousy back cover
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Received this phone yesterday, and sending it back today.It came in a box, brand new, with a manual, battery, wall charger, and rear cover.Pros:The phone itself is very nice. It is tiny, has a very attractive design with fully functional keyboard inside and responsive bright LED-lit dial pad on the outer side. The outer panel has good sunlight visibility.It's a smart phone with 3G capability, GPS, camera, music player, bluetooth and other bells and whistles. All of that is probably working smoothly for AT&T;, but for T-mobile, one needs to jump through some hoops to make it to recognize the network (however, calls go through just fine). Quick online search easily reveals the necessary settings for T-mobile. So overall, this is a good, well designed, functional device, very pleasant to hold in hand, with responsive controls and beautiful displays.Cons:The manual is printed in such tiny letters that one needs a magnifying glass to read it. The pdf file for the manual can be downloaded from the web from Pantech site. Also, manual states that the phone is powered by holding "HOLD" button - which is not true. It is powered on and off by holding "Hang up" button, either on the outer dialing pad, or inside.The rear cover, however, is a different story. It's a tiny piece of flimsy plastic, and does not fit. I spent enough time trying to align it so it snaps into place, but it never does - tiny tabs are misaligned so only one side snaps, and the other is not. I guess that's why there are so many complains about rear cover falling off. Seems like a manufacturing defect. What a bummer - to design a nice, functional phone and provide it with a poorly fitted back cover.  I am returning this phone.

Reviews.Title: New Phone
Reviews.Author: ed
Reviews.Content: Bought a phone off Amazon for my son, its his first phone and didn't want to spend a lot of money.  I received it ahead of schedule, perfect NIB and as promised.Happy Customer!!!!

Reviews.Title: A good phone, but lacking.
Reviews.Author: Video Nutt
Reviews.Content: PROS:Good sound quality, both ways.Good signal sensitivity, calls don't tend to break-up or drop.As long as you ALWAYS lock the phone after each use, the battery run time is quite good.Reasonably easy to text with.Reasonably compact.Cheap.CONS:Can't be programed for voice recognition dialing, a MAJOR flaw! This phone is completely useless for handsfree bluetooth use. Don't buy this phone if you live in a state that will not allow hand held cell phone use while driving.It is supposed to have bluetooth A2DP (music streaming) but the music player app on the phone doesn't work. The phone locks-up whenever I try to open the app.Some of the settings are VERY hard to find and some of setting locations don't make any sense. The menu system is illogical and the user's manual isn't any help.The charging port has a ridiculous cover, I removed it!Sometimes the message/voicemail notification sound gets stuck and continues to sound repeatedly (I have it set to sound a notification every 5 minutes) even after deleting ALL the messages/voicemails. The only solution that I have found is to reboot the phone.

Reviews.Title: Won't charge
Reviews.Author: Roger Chenoweth
Reviews.Content: It got to the point where it wouldn't hold a charge. It would show charged and when I unplugged it would go dead.

Reviews.Title: Terrible phone
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Now, I realize that this may not be the phone's fault, but at least I could have worked around data charges on any other phone.I read reviews about this phone fervently, learning all of it's downsides. I came across the small keyboard, the bad back that never quite locks into place, small keyboard, etc. I was okay with all of this, however, I can not except having no wifi. This phone wasn't even built to find your router, there's no way get around using your extremely limited data packages without buying a seperate package (exclusively from at&t;, meaning that you can't get it from an unlocked phone like mine)! This is ridiculous! No phone should have this many problems.Granted, if you have a good signal, maybe you can deal with the fact that the keyboard is so small, or the horrible uncomfortably of texting while it's charging. But I have no signal inside of my house, just like 90% of the world, so please, do yourself a favor and find another phone. ANY OTHER PHONE.

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone for daughter
Reviews.Author: MysterySolver
Reviews.Content: My daughter had this exact phone for several years and it started failing. She wanted to get the same phone again. She loves its features, but the battery cover doesn't fit or stick well at all. She tapes the battery in place.

Reviews.Title: Sucks!
Reviews.Author: Arraya Fickes
Reviews.Content: SUCKS! Worthless phone ever! Shuts down, freezes, back of phone comes off all the time and half the time doesnt work!

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Clamshell phone in blue with touch-sensitive OLED dialing face with haptic feedback flips open to reveal full QWERTY keyboard and 2.6-inch LCD screen
Compatible with optional AT&T; Navigator turn-by-turn GPS, AT&T; Video Share, AT&T; Mobile Music, and streaming Cellular Video services
2-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion to 32 GB; access to personal email and instant messaging services
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 336 hours (14 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Pantech Impact P7000 Unlocked GSM Phone with OLED Touchscreen Dialing Pad, QWERTY Keyboard, 2MP Camera, Video, A-GPS, Bluetooth, MP3/MP4 Player and microSD Slot - Blue
